20101228023022.000|20101228023024.000|CC1|49th STREET, JUST NEAR THE BASE 
20101228023024.000|20101228023025.000|CC1|OF THE WORLD FAMOUS 30 ROCK     
20101228023025.000|20101228023028.000|CC1|CHRISTMAS TREE WHERE MILLIONS OF
20101228023028.000|20101228023030.000|CC1|PEOPLE COME TO SEE THIS SITE    
20101228023030.000|20101228023032.000|CC1|EVERY YEAR.

20101228023034.000|20101228023035.000|CC1|IN THE SOUTH, CAME UP THROUGH   
20101228023035.000|20101228023036.000|CC1|NEW YORK CITY.                  
20101228023036.000|20101228023038.000|CC1|AGAIN, THE MID-ATLANTIC, ALL THE
20101228023038.000|20101228023039.000|CC1|WAY THROUGH NEW ENGLAND.        
20101228023039.000|20101228023041.000|CC1|AND THIS WAS A WHITEOUT HERE AT 
20101228023041.000|20101228023043.000|CC1|THIS TIME YESTERDAY.            
20101228023043.000|20101228023045.000|CC1|A HISTORY MAKER, NO DOUBT.      
20101228023045.000|20101228023046.000|CC1|RECORDS FELL ALONG THE LENGTH OF
20101228023046.000|20101228023048.000|CC1|THE STORM.                      
20101228023048.000|20101228023050.000|CC1|80 MILLION AMERICANS WERE       
20101228023050.000|20101228023052.000|CC1|IMPACTED BY THE STORM, AND LOOK 
20101228023052.000|20101228023054.000|CC1|AT THAT STAT, 35 MILLION        
20101228023054.000|20101228023056.000|CC1|AMERICANS WITNESSED BLIZZARD

20101228023059.000|20101228023101.000|CC1|PARALYZED.

20101228023102.000|20101228023104.000|CC1|ALL OF IT CAME TO A COMPLETE

20101228023111.000|20101228023114.000|CC1|STORM IS ALL SAID AND DONE, IT'S
20101228023114.000|20101228023116.000|CC1|ESTIMATED 6,000 TOTAL FLIGHT

20101228023135.000|20101228023136.000|CC1|THE AREA I'M STANDING.

20101228023207.000|20101228023209.000|CC1|THUNDER BOOMING OVER MANHATTAN.

20101228023212.000|20101228023215.000|CC1|BLIZZARD.

20101228023531.000|20101228023533.000|CC1|CRIPPLING AIR TRAVEL NATIONWIDE.

20101228023544.000|20101228023545.000|CC1|TERMINAL, BUT THERE'S NEW HOPE.

20101228023550.000|20101228023551.000|CC1|>> I THINK HAVING A RUNWAY OPEN

20101228023601.000|20101228023603.000|CC1|AHEAD OF THE STORM TO AVOID

20101228023608.000|20101228023609.000|CC1|BLIZZARD IS OVER, BUT FOR US IT 
20101228023609.000|20101228023611.000|CC1|ISN'T.

20101228023612.000|20101228023614.000|CC1|AIRPORTS ARE OPEN DOESN'T MEAN  
20101228023614.000|20101228023617.000|CC1|THE AIRLINES CAN OR WILL FLY.

20101228023628.000|20101228023629.000|CC1|PRECANCELING ANOTHER 40 FOR     
20101228023629.000|20101228023630.000|CC1|TOMORROW.

20101228023634.000|20101228023635.000|CC1|ATLANTA.                        
20101228023635.000|20101228023636.000|CC1|>> ALL I WANT TO DO IS GO HOME. 
20101228023636.000|20101228023637.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TO WASHINGTON, D.C.

20101228024751.000|20101228024753.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20101228024753.000|20101228024753.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20101228024753.000|20101228024756.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20101228024756.000|20101228024756.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20101228024756.000|20101228024758.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20101228024758.000|20101228024800.000|CC1|       have been reported.

20101228024800.000|20101228024802.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20101228024802.000|20101228024804.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.

20101228025238.000|20101228025241.000|CC1|  BLOOD DISORDERS HAVE OCCURRED.
